title: Private Yacht Charter With Captain
priceShort: Starting at $450 for a two hour sail
priceLong:
$450 (2 hour minimum)

Plus cash tip to the Captain
body: Spend a few hours or a whole day aboard our yachts! You pick the yacht size and Captain Jack's Tours will provide you with a US Coast Guard Certified Captain. Your private group (6 passengers maximum) will experience the fun and magic of sailing along the Santa Barbara pristine coastline. You can simply enjoy the views or feel free to help sail the yacht.
